title: Trump Rally, 2020, Berman Resignation
itunes:title: Trump Rally, 2020, Berman Resignation
description:
Guests: Jordan Fabian, Bloomberg White House reporter, Greg Brower, Partner at Brownstein, Hyatt, Farber, Schreck and Co-chair of the Government Investigations & White Collar Defense practice, Brian Darling, former Senior Communications Director for Sen. Rand Paul and Founder of Liberty Government Affairs, and Dr. Lara Brown, Director of the Graduate School of Political Management at George Washington University and author of the new book "Amateur Hour: Presidential Character and the Question of Leadership."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
